## Welcome to the STAT 20 Midterm {.smaller}

:::: columns
::: {.column width="47%"}
**Before the exam begins**

- Be sure you are not seated directly next to another student (leave an open seat).
- Remove any ball caps / hoods.
- Power-off and stow all materials and devices (phones, calculators, tablets, etc) in your backpack/bag under your seat.
- Take out a pencil/pen and your two pages of notes (the cheat sheets, optional).
- Check that exam has 4 sheets of paper.
- Write your name and Berkeley ID# on the front of the exam.
- Do not open the exam until told to begin.
:::

::: {.column width="6%"}
:::

::: {.column width="47%"}
**During the exam**

- If you need to use the bathroom, bring your exam and phone to a proctor at the front.
- If you have a question, please raise your hand and we will come by.
- During the exam, a proctor will come by to check your photo ID.
- Please do not get up and leave if there are fewer than 5 minutes left.
:::
::::
